TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConstructorBuilder extends System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class ConstructorBuilder Inherits ConstructorInfo Implements _ConstructorBuilder
public ref class ConstructorBuilder sealed : System::Reflection::ConstructorInfo, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorBuilder
type ConstructorBuilder = class inherit ConstructorInfo interface _ConstructorBuilder

summary.span: Defines and represents a constructor of a dynamic class.

span.span: Defines and represents a constructor of a dynamic class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來建構函式中的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，包括名稱、 屬性、 簽章和建構函式主體可完整描述。 is used to fully describe a constructor in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), including the name, attributes, signature, and constructor body. 它用於搭配類別，以在執行階段建立的類別。It is used in conjunction with the class to create classes at run time. 呼叫若要取得的執行個體。Call to get an instance of . 如果您沒有定義建構函式適用於您的動態類型，自動提供預設建構函式，而且它會呼叫基底類別的預設建構函式。If you do not define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is provided automatically, and it calls the default constructor of the base class. 如果您使用若要定義您的動態類型的建構函式，不提供預設建構函式。If you use to define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is not provided. 您有下列選項來提供預設建構函式，除了您定義的建構函式：You have the following options for providing a default constructor in addition to the constructor you defined: - 如果您想只會呼叫基底類別的預設建構函式的預設建構函式時，您可以使用方法來建立一個 （並選擇性地限制存取）。If you want a default constructor that simply calls the default constructor of the base class, you can use the method to create one (and optionally restrict access to it). 不提供此預設建構函式的實作。Do not provide an implementation for this default constructor. 如果您這樣做，當您嘗試使用建構函式時，會擲回例外狀況。If you do, an exception is thrown when you try to use the constructor. 沒有例外狀況時擲回呼叫方法。No exception is thrown when the method is called. - 如果您想要的預設建構函式，不會發生多個呼叫預設建構函式的基底類別，或呼叫的另一個建構函式的基底類別，或執行其他動作完全，您必須使用方法用來建立，並提供您自己的實作。If you want a default constructor that does something more than simply calling the default constructor of the base class, or that calls another constructor of the base class, or that does something else entirely, you must use the method to create a , and provide your own implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明內容的使用方式的`ConstructorBuilder`。The following code sample illustrates the contextual usage of a `ConstructorBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The security action to be taken, such as Demand, Assert, and so on.

summary.span: Adds declarative security to this constructor.

span.span: Adds declarative security to this constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也可以呼叫多次，指定安全性動作的每個呼叫 (例如`Demand`， `Assert`，和`Deny`) 和一組適用於動作的權限。 can be called several times, with each call specifying a security action (such as `Demand`, `Assert`, and `Deny`) and a set of permissions that the action applies to. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 版中，藉由使用此方法套用至建構函式的宣告式安全性屬性會儲存在舊的 XML 中繼資料格式。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a constructor by using this method are stored in the old XML metadata format. 請參閱發出的宣告式安全性屬性。See Emitting Declarative Security Attributes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`AddDeclarativeSecurity`。The following code sample illustrates the use of `AddDeclarativeSecurity`. span.span: Returns an that is the return value of the invoked constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果建構函式沒有任何參數，值`parameters`參數應該是`null`。If the constructor has no parameters, the value of the `parameters` parameter should be `null`. 否則，數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該與數目、 類型和此執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。Otherwise, the number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 例如，如果這個執行個體所反映的建構函式宣告為公用類別接受兩個字串，則`parameters`參數應為陣列的長度為 2。For example, if the constructor reflected by this instance is declared as public class taking two strings, then the `parameters` parameter should be an array of with length 2. > [!NOTE] > 完全信任的程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可存取，而且完全受信任的程式碼時，使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數字、 類型和參數陣列中元素的順序應該相同數目、 類型和此執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序。The number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端具有存取權限，而且參數是正確的數字、 順序和型別。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission, and that the parameters are of the correct number, order and type. 完全信任的程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可存取，而且完全受信任的程式碼時，使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.
